page.title: 16Groups in Sigglesthorne
page.content: In Sigglesthorne there are groups which contribute to village life. For the ladies over eighteen there is {Womans Institute (W.I).}It costs Â£4 to join. There is the{Darby & Joan}for the old people in Sigglesthorne & Seaton. {Seaton and Sigglesthorne {Horticultural Society}holds an annual show every August. There is a{Church Council}for people who help with the church. There is the{Parents, Teachers {Association (PTA)}for the parents and teachers, but the parents can not come unless their children come to this school. The PTA organise things: Garden Fetes, Bonfire Night party, Pantomime trip, car boot sales and other social events.
